answers.answer: Yep. That's why I cut down on water intake.
I try to cut it down but i be so thirsty ALL the time.
Oic. Damned if you do; damned if you don't.
Even if i dont drink anything before i go to sleep i end up having to pee anyway and i get something to drink after.
Yea I get mad cz I'm so sleepy and I have to get up and go to the bathroom

Just curious, and please do not be alarmed, but have you been tested for gestational diabetes yet? I was like that in my last trimester (after it was confirmed I had GD) and asked the nurse was that a side effect of having GD and she told me yes. At night is when it seemed like I craved cold water the most.

My boyfriend told me to get tested for it because even before i was pregnant im ALWAYS thirsty even after i drink sonething.i havnt asked my doctor yet but its something i will def.do now that it has come up again.
Okay, that would be good to know. To me, it's important to find that out. How far along are you?
Yea i will def.ask my doctor on monday when i go.n i am 17 weeks.

I'm not sure if they will test you that early, but it definitely will not hurt to ask. Talk to your OB, it could be nothing- and hopefully it is not serious, and see what they say. Let me know how it goes because I'm interested, if you don't mind.
Ok.no problem.i will let you kno when i find out whats going on.hopefully it is nothing.

I had the same problem. Drink all you want in the day. An hour or so before bed stop drinking it and pass out and you should just start waking up 1 or 2 times at night. I had to do research cause I was tired of getting up like 5 or 6 times at night

question: I drink A LOT of water but i am soooooo tired of having to get up n go pee every 30 min.exspecially while im sleep..
title: water
